rooms.description: Open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the north and east facades for natural light, following Scandinavian minimalistic style.
Integrated dining space adjacent to the living area with a modern aesthetic.
Contemporary kitchen featuring energy-efficient appliances and ample storage, incorporating Vastu principles by orienting the main entrance on the north side.
Guest bedroom with ample natural light and a Scandinavian design aesthetic.
Spacious master bedroom with built-in wardrobes and private balcony, oriented according to Vastu for tranquility.
Well-equipped bathroom serving the master bedroom and guest rooms.

openings.description: Large, energy-efficient front door with a Vastu-compliant north orientation.
Service entrance to the servant's quarters.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed with Scandinavian simplicity and ample natural light.
Another bedroom complementing the G+2 structure with balanced proportions.
Dedicated space for servants' quarters ensuring privacy and comfort.
Additional bathroom facility on the first floor serving the bedrooms.

openings.description: Sturdy, open staircase connecting ground and first floors, aligning with Scandinavian design principles.
Secondary service door to the servant's quarters on the first floor.

rooms.description: Expansive rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and space for relaxation.

openings.description: Access staircase to the rooftop terrace, integrating seamlessly with the building's design.
